title: "Are you ready for AI? EIOPA Report on AI governance principles: towards ethical & trustworthy AI in the EU insurance sector"
excerpt: "In June, the European Insurance and Occupational Pensions Authority published the report of its Consultative Expert Group on Digital Ethics in insurance providing a set of Artificial Intelligence (AI) governance principles for an ethical and trustworthy AI in the European insurance sector."
